item.title: Traveloka will introduce awards based on audience participation for Asia's Got Talent
item.description:
Traveloka, a popular Southeast Asian travel app, is sponsoring the second season of AXN’s Asia’s Got Talent and introducing the Traveloka Awards. The Traveloka Awards will recognize the contestant with the most compelling background, emphasizing unique talents and strong family and friend connections. Premiering this October, Asiaâ€™s Got Talent on AXN will feature ten episodes, including auditions, semifinals, a finale, and a results show revealing the winner of a $100,000 prize from Traveloka...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/traveloka-will-introduce-awards-based-on-audience-participation-for-asia-s-got-talent/
